text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُوا۟ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ذَٰلِكَ وَأَصْلَحُوا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ

translation.en.sahih: Except for those who repent after that and correct themselves. For indeed, Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.
translation.id.indonesian: kecuali orang-orang yang taubat, sesudah (kafir) itu dan mengadakan perbaikan. Karena sesungguhnya Allah Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang.
